11ic is an online gaming company with presence across Asia that offers a wide-range of high-end products from Sportsbook, Live Casino, eSports, Lottery, Online Poker, Slot Machines, and more exciting gaming products!

One of the first online casino developed by AG Group ( Asia Gaming ) in India, 11ic carried the mission to establish itself as a GOAT in the industry and social life of Indian and Bangladesh players, and as one of the most exclusive and sought after casino memberships. For over decades, AG Group owned Les Ambassadeurs, London and New World Hotel, had serves Royals & VIPs all around the world to their gaming floors.

11ic works together with a variety of remarkable gaming platform which includes Cricket, Exchange, BTI Sport, 9wickets, SABA, Evolution, SSG, Ezugi, Rummy, Sexy Baccarat, Micro Gaming, Play Tech, SBO, Pragmatic Play, iSoftBet, AllBet, CQ9, etc., that will surely fulfill all your entertainment needs. We also offer thousands of other sports and casino games, with Cricket in the forefront.

At 11ic, we strive to offer our members not only with the best gaming experience but also with the most advanced security technology that will ensure to keep your information confidential.

credibility.title: Credibility
credibility.details:
11ic is a fully registered gambling and entertainment company founded in August 2018.

At 11ic, we provide a safe and stable platform for our current and future members which ensures ultimate gambling experience.

Our brand holds an offshore online gaming license from Curacao and a certification from Gaming Associates, which guarantees that 11ic conforms to the set standards and regulations in the internet gambling space.

11ic provide a safe and stable platform for our current and future members which ensures ultimate gambling experience. Not only that, we have a team of professionally trained, enthusiastic and efficient staffs who are ready to assist you with your inquiries and difficulties 24/7.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.details:
We recognize and respect your right to privacy. Keeping your data safe is our paramount concern.

We will keep all of your personal data private and will not disclose this information to any third party unless required to do so by applicable laws and regulations or a court order; with the exception that we reserve the right to disclose and transfer your personal data to our respective payment settlement service providers and financial institutions to the extent necessary for the completion of payments for services provided through our website.

All personal information supplied by users is transmitted via Secure Socket (SSL 128 bit encryption Standard) and is stored in secure operating environments that are not accessible by the public. Internal access to all data is limited and strictly monitored.

11ic and our partner may contact you via email about offers which may be of interest to you. It is 11ic's policy not to share any personal identifying material obtained through 11ic's websites with any third party.

Collection of Information Through Call Centers:If you contact our hotline or we contact you using telephone, we may monitor or record the phone call for quality assurance, and security purposes. Please note that when you register on our website, you acknowledge and consent to us to collect your personal information during the phone conversation as well as to record the phone call.

disclaimer-of-warranty.details:
11ic does not accept liability for the content or accuracy of external websites. Fraud alert: Infringement of trademark 11ic prides itself as a reliable and responsible online gaming company. And for the past 5 years, it continues to uphold its main objective to protect customer rights, adhering to industry rules and regulations, and improving the quality of customer journey from registration to after sales.

The company undergoes tedious security checks to not only provide its customers an enjoyable experience but also a safe place to play and transact in.

Due to the overwhelming support from customers, 11ic continues to grow in magnitude. However, since dissatisfied customers cannot be avoided in any business or industry, counterfeit trademarks in the market exist. This seriously damages 11ic's image, confusing and cheating valuable customers.

Please be careful and trust only 11ic's official website and channels. Should you encounter or in possession of any relevant information on the mentioned fraudulent company, feel free to contact 11ic Customer Service (link). Your report is highly appreciated.

Team 11ic

You represent and undertake that all information supplied by you when registering and completing the Membership Application is accurate, true and complete in all respects including, your name on the Membership Application ("Name"), sources of funds (including the relevant bank accounts and card numbers), any e-mail address or telephone number(s) you have provided and your residential address. We will take reasonable and appropriate measures to ensure that your personal information as disclosed to us shall remain confidential. We will not report or disclose your personal data or betting information unless compelled to do so by any applicable laws and regulations, Court order, or by the relevant gaming or law enforcement authorities or as otherwise provided for in these Terms and Conditions. It is your responsibility to keep your personal information confidential. We reserve the right to disclose and transfer your personal data to our respective payment settlement service providers and financial institutions to the extent necessary for the completion of payments for Services provided through the Website or if compelled to do so by applicable laws and regulations, to the relevant gaming or law enforcement authorities. It is your sole responsibility to ensure that the laws applicable to you do not prohibit you from using and accessing the Website(s) and the Information contained therein, downloading and installing the Software and/or using and participating in the Services. We may require further evidence of identification and age from you to verify your Membership Application (e.g. valid picture identification and debit/credit card). If there is any change to your information details as originally supplied by you, you shall notify us of the relevant change without delay. In order to confirm your Name and address, 11ic reserves the right, inter alias, to confirm your Name and address by post. 11ic may, at our discretion, undertake additional security checks against any information that you provide. By agreeing to these Terms and Conditions you agree and understand that 11ic may access, use, process and store the results of any identification verification or checks that may be made against you. We reserve the right to reject your Membership Application without reference to you or assigning any reason whatsoever. You are allowed to open only one betting account with 11ic. Should we discover that you have more than one account with 11ic, we reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to treat all accounts that you have with 11ic as a single joint account, terminate the additional account(s) and/or to terminate this Agreement with you.

placement-of-bets-and-bet-acceptance-pro.title: Placement of Bets and Bet Acceptance Procedure
placement-of-bets-and-bet-acceptance-pro.details: We accept bets for games, sporting and other events that are advertised on the Website(s) and/or through the Device(s) from time to time. All such bets are subject to the relevant House Betting Rules applicable to each event or game, and to these Terms and Conditions. If a manifest error or mistake occurs or an incorrect participant is quoted for any event, all bets placed on that event shall be void. In the event of any malfunction to the 11ic gaming system, failed transmission or other technical issues or suspected fraud 11ic reserves the right to void any and/or all bets placed. Notwithstanding any other provision in these Terms and Conditions, 11ic reserves the right, in our absolute discretion, to decline all, or part, of any bet placed without providing any reason whatsoever. We only accept bets made through the internet and/or Devices in compliance with these Terms and Conditions. Bets are not accepted in any other form (whether by post, email, fax or otherwise) and where received will be void regardless of the outcome. Subject to the other provisions herein, bets will be deemed to be validly placed by you if your username and password have been entered correctly, subject always to there being sufficient available funds in your account. You are responsible and liable for all activities and transactions that take place through the use of any of the following (or any combination there of): your name; your account number; your username and password; regardless of whether the use of the foregoing was authorized by you or not. It is your sole responsibility to ensure that the details of your bets are correct and that you understand the terms of the bet registration including any rules applicable to the bet before you confirm placing of the bet and in this regard you may wish to review your bet for mistakes before it is transmitted to us. Subject to the other provisions herein, once your bets have been placed and their acceptance confirmed by us, they may not be canceled, revoked or changed by you and shall be deemed to be conclusive evidence in respect of the bets that you have placed. It should be noted that all bets are logged and recorded in the transaction log database. 11ic's transaction logs shall be conclusive evidence of all transactions and times at which the transactions are placed. Subject to the requirement for payment to be received by us prior to a bet being deemed to be placed (and if this is not received then we reserve the right to void the bet) and the other provisions herein, bets will be deemed valid and accepted by 11ic when a transaction ID is displayed on your screen and duly reflected in your transaction history. No betting is permitted after any deadline set by us, the commencement of an event and/or where the outcome of an event is known at the time of placement of your bet. If any event is erroneously left open for betting after the commencement of the event and/or where the outcome of an event is known, 11ic reserves the right to decline or void such bets placed without reference to you. Acceptance of any bet or any part thereof shall be at the sole discretion of 11ic. For the avoidance of doubt, this clause does not prohibit "in play" or "half time" bets where allowed by 11ic. Advertised start times of the events displayed on the Website(s) are for information purposes only. If for any reason a bet is inadvertently accepted by India after an event or match has commenced other than "in play" or "half time" bets where accepted by 11ic, 11ic reserves the right to cancel and void such bet. Unless stated otherwise within the rules for each sport or event, the result of a match or event will be determined on the day of its conclusion for betting purposes. Any subsequent enquiry that may result in an overturned decision will not be recognized by 11ic, and original settlement of bets will stand. If the venue for a sporting event is changed, all bets placed based on the original venue shall at the sole discretion of 11ic be voidable by us. The winner of an event or game will be determined on the date of the event's conclusion according to the House Betting Rules. 11ic does not recognize suspended games, protests or overturned decisions for betting purposes. Should you include a non-runner or void selection in a multiple bet, the bet will be settled on the remaining valid selections only. You acknowledge that any and all odds, lines and handicaps are subject to fluctuation without notice, and the foregoing will become fixed only at the time of acceptance of the bet by us. Where a manifest error, mistake or system failure deriving from 11ic results in an incorrect odd, line or handicap taken in a bet, the bet, or that part of the bet if it is a multiple bet/parlay sought to be placed with 11ic will be void. Provided the error, mistake or failure is rectified in time, 11ic may in our absolute discretion (but shall not be obliged to) make reasonable efforts to contact you to allow the choice of placing another bet at the correct odds, lines and handicaps. We will not accept any simultaneously placed bets on one event from you. In respect of any bet and the associated transactions therewith, the decision of 11ic is final and conclusive. When the player wishes to place a bet using Indonesian Rupiah, the player shall place his bet by eliminating the last three (3) zeros from his desired stake. All bets shall be in multiples of one thousand. For easy reference, please see the following examples: Once the player types the amount in accordance with the above mentioned rules, the system automatically recognizes that three (3) zeros shall be added to the amount of stake in order to determine the true amount of stake desired by the player. Customers must register their bet request as individuals. Repeated requests containing the same selections from the same or different customers may be subsequently deemed where we believe the customers are acting in collusion or as part of a syndicate and/or identical or similar bet requests are registered within a short time of each other and dealt with us accordingly.

settlement-of-transactions.title: Settlement of Transactions
settlement-of-transactions.details: When using a credit or debit card or effecting a bank transfer, the card holder's or account holder's name as appropriate must be the same as the Name. 11ic reserves the right not to settle a transaction in the event of discrepancies between the card holder's or account holder's name and the Name. You are fully responsible for paying all monies owed to 11ic and or other players (as the case may be). In respect of any payment made by you, you agree that you will not make or procure the making of any charge-backs and/or deny or reverse any such payment, and that you will reimburse 11ic for any charge-backs, denials or reversal of payments as well as any and all losses suffered and expenses incurred by 11ic as a consequence thereof. 11ic may, at our sole and absolute discretion, cease to provide services or payment to certain users or to users paying with certain credit or debit cards or by bank transfers from certain banks. The maximum winnings payable by 11ic to any member on any valid accepted Sportsbook bet placed with 11ic shall be limited to GBPÂ£100,000 (or equivalent) per bet or the maximum payout by the individual bet types whichever is lower. The maximum amount of each bet varies according to the specific bet type offered on the mini bet list offered from time to time on the Service and is subject to change without prior notice but in any event will not exceed the available funds in your account. Your possible winnings may be quoted exclusive of bet amount and this should be considered when placing your bet. All your winnings will be credited to your account. 11ic shall not in any way be responsible or liable to you for any funds/winnings credited to an account in error, and 11ic reserves the right to void any transactions involving such funds, either at the time or retrospectively. Should funds be credited to your account in error it is your responsibility to inform 11ic without delay and such funds are not to be used by you and we reserve the right to withdraw such funds and void any transactions placed using them. collection-of-winnings.title: Collection of Winnings
collection-of-winnings.details: Your winnings from settled bets are credited to your account and shall be withdrawn in accordance with our withdrawal policy including where applicable but not limited to provision of a copy of valid photographic identification, satisfactory verification of address and/or credit/debit card or bank account to our satisfaction. Where your card issuer allows, your winnings may be credited to the credit or debit card account which was used for the original placement of the deposit. A cheque or bank wire will only be issued in the Name, and where a deposit has been made by credit or debit card this must also be the same as the name of the registered cardholder. We reserve the right to limit the number of cards or bank accounts used by you. A turnover of at least 1 time on the value of deposit needs to be reached before a withdrawal can be requested. 11ic reserves the right to make a charge to your account to cover all reasonable costs relating to both the deposit and withdrawal. All bank charges that 11ic incurs arising from or in connection with any of your betting transactions shall be borne and reimbursed by you and 11ic is entitled to deduct and offset the foregoing from the winnings payable to you or from your account, as the case may be. 11ic does not undertake to advise you that you have an outstanding balance to collect. If you do not access your account by logging onto the Website(s) and using the services offered for any consecutive period of 6 months and above your account will be deemed inactive. We shall be entitled to charge you periodic administrative fees during the period that your account remains inactive and set off such charges against funds in the account up to the extent of your account balance. If an inactive account is identified, we may attempt to contact the account holder via telephone, email or written communications, using the contact details registered with the account. If this fails we may use other methods at our disposal to seek to contact the account holder. If such efforts prove unsuccessful and contact with the customer cannot be established within twelve months of the date from which the account was identified as 'dormant', any outstanding bankroll in such account may be set aside and we shall reserve the power to close the account and designate at our discretion that the outstanding bankroll may be taken by us and pooled towards applicable gambling duty or allocated along with other dormant funds to a gambling charity.

progressive-jackpot-disclaimer.details: Progressive Jackpot begins at seed value once a player wins the whole jackpot or when a new jackpot starts. Certain jackpot seed amounts are funded by licensees.

marketing-opt-in.title: Marketing Opt-in
marketing-opt-in.details: Opt in to get access to latest offers and promotions. you can opt out from our communications at any time. By choosing this option that includes text(including WhatsApp & telegram) messaging and emails on the registered id. you agree to receive transactional and reminder texts & emails to your mobile phone number & email id listed above. You understand and agree that the text messages and emails are sent via an autodialer and that you are not required to agree to the receipt of texts or email in order to be a 11ic member. Opt-out at any time. Text STOP to opt-out; HELP for help. Standard message/data rates may apply. You can also contact our customer support to opt-out of the email service.

what-are-the-products-of-11ic.title: What are the products of 11ic?
what-are-the-products-of-11ic.details: To create an account with 11ic, simply click on the "Register" button on our homepage and fill out the required information. You'll need to provide a valid email address, phone number, and create a secure password. Once you've completed the registration form, you'll receive a verification email to activate your account.

what-payment-methods-do-you-accept.title: What payment methods do you accept?
what-payment-methods-do-you-accept.details: We accept various payment methods including bank transfers, credit/debit cards, e-wallets, and cryptocurrency. Specific payment options may vary by region. Please check the deposit/withdrawal section of your account for available methods in your area.

how-long-do-withdrawals-take.title: How long do withdrawals take?
how-long-do-withdrawals-take.details:
Withdrawal processing times vary depending on the payment method chosen:
  - E-wallets: Usually processed within 1-4 hours
  - Bank transfers: 1-3 business days
  - Credit/debit cards: 3-5 business days
  - Cryptocurrency: Usually within 1-2 hours
  
  Please note that additional verification may be required for first-time withdrawals.

is-my-personal-information-secure.title: Is my personal information secure?
is-my-personal-information-secure.details: Yes, we take your privacy and security very seriously. We use advanced SSL encryption technology to protect all data transmitted between your device and our servers. We also comply with strict data protection regulations and never share your personal information with third parties without your consent.

what-should-i-do-if-i-forget-my-password.title: What should I do if I forget my password?
what-should-i-do-if-i-forget-my-password.details: If you forget your password, click on the "Forgot Password" link on the login page. Enter your registered email address, and we'll send you instructions to reset your password. Follow the link in the email to create a new password for your account.

how-can-i-contact-customer-support.title: How can I contact customer support?
how-can-i-contact-customer-support.details:
Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you. You can reach us through:
  - Live chat on our website
  - Email: support@11ic.com
  - WhatsApp: +919178888888
  - Telegram: @11ic
  
  We strive to respond to all inquiries as quickly as possible.

are-there-any-age-restrictions.title: Are there any age restrictions?
are-there-any-age-restrictions.details: Yes, you must be at least 18 years old to create an account and participate in any gaming activities on our platform. We may request identity verification to confirm your age and identity as part of our responsible gaming policies.

what-is-responsible-gaming.title: What is responsible gaming?
what-is-responsible-gaming.details: Responsible gaming means playing within your means and maintaining control over your gaming activities. We provide various tools to help you manage your gaming, including deposit limits, session time limits, and self-exclusion options. If you feel you may have a gambling problem, please contact us or seek help from professional organizations.

affiliation-guidelines.details: Affiliation Guidelines: Only approved and properly tagged creative materials, supplied by us from time to time, may be used to promote 11ic. Advertorials and personal endorsements are allowed but all materials not designed by 11ic need to be approved in writing; such approval shall not be unreasonably withheld. You may not modify or use for any other purpose any IP rights, banners or other creative material supplied by us without the written prior consent of 11ic. All copyright or IP rights notices on any material supplied or approved by 11ic must remain and not be modified or eliminated. By agreeing to participate in the 11ic Affiliate Program, you are agreeing to download banners, text or promotional material and place it on your site, utilize it within e-mail, direct marketing using your affiliate URL or print. These methods are the only approved methods by which you may advertise 11ic's products and services. Banners and links may not be placed within unsolicited e-mail, unauthorized newsgroup postings, or chat rooms or through the use of "bots". Traffic generated illegally will not be counted and may result in the termination of your affiliate account with us. We will terminate this Agreement immediately if there is any form of spamming on your behalf or if you discredit 11ic through false advertising, written or uttered words. You shall not make any claims, representations, or warranties in connection with 11ic and you shall have no authority to and shall not bind 11ic to any obligations. Without our prior written approval, you will only use our approved banners and links and will not alter their appearance nor refer to us in any promotional materials. The appearance and syntax of the hypertext transfer links are designed and designated by us and constitute the only authorized and permitted representation of 11ic. You will not knowingly benefit from known or suspected traffic not generated in good faith whether or not it actually causes 11ic damage. Should fraudulent activity arise through a person directed to a site via your link, we retain the right to retract the commissions paid to you at any time. Our decision in this regard will be final and no correspondence will be entered into. We reserve the right to retain all amounts due to you under this Agreement if we have reasonable cause to believe that such traffic has been caused with your knowledge. Even if you have not knowingly generated such traffic, we reserve the right to withhold affiliate commissions with respect to such. Affiliates are prohibited from playing at any of the sportsbooks promoted by 11ic through their own affiliate link or from the affiliate link of an associate who shares all or part of the commission with the affiliate or a third party. This shall include any individuals or playing groups from which, an Affiliate receives compensation or remuneration from of any kind. In the event of violation of this section, 11ic and the respective website that has been played with shall have the right to void all play and eliminate any earned commissions applicable from such play and eliminate the affiliate from our Affiliate Program terminating this Agreement and void any future play at 11ic. You are not allowed to concurrently maintain both affiliate and referral relationships with 11ic. Violation of this provision grants 11ic the right to unilaterally terminate either or both affiliate and/or referral relationships. A referral relationship refers to a relationship with 11ic pursuant to 11ic's Refer-A-Friend Program (as set out and available in the Website.

affiliate-tagging.details: Affiliate Tagging: You are only responsible for directing customers to the 11ic website. Only properly tagged customers can be assigned to an affiliate. Should an affiliate tag be improperly inserted into the affiliate site or not properly received by the 11ic web server the resulting customer registration and purchases will not be assigned to the affiliate. Therefore, it is the responsibility of the affiliate to ensure that all links are properly tagged.

revenue-sharing-payment.details: Revenue Sharing & Payment: 11ic will pay out a revenue share on the Commissionable Earnings generated by each customer, as defined by 11ic Affiliate Program commission structure, provided that you maintain in your account as an affiliate, at least six (6) Active Wagering Members in any given calendar month. However, 11ic will reserves the right to withhold an affiliate commission payout in any particular month whether in part or in full, regardless of the 6 qualified active members, if the affiliate is found not to make an effort to promote 11ic more than 2 months as reflected in no NEW wagering members brought in; lack of 11ic banners on the affiliate website; and or lack of any other online and offline promotional activities seen. The commission shall be withheld until there are new wagering members seen in the affiliate account where 11bet shall have the sole discretion to release either a full or a partial of the withheld commission to the affiliate. Any commission that has been withheld for a period exceeding 6 months may be voided at the discretion of 11ic. Active Wagering Members refers to customers that reach a minimum wagering turnover amount equivalent to 5,000 rupees (PKR 5,000.00) each in any given calendar month. Commissionable Earnings are calculated as 11ic profit, less charge-back, complimentary money, free money offers and other incentives offered to the customer, derived from at least six (6) Active Wagering Members in a calendar month. Charge-back: A credit card holder discovers irregular transactions made on his/her Credit/Debit Card, which was not authorized by him/her. The credit card holder then requests his/her bank to reverse these charges. Charge backs relate to fraudulent use by a third party of the credit card holder's card or card number. "India Gross Win" is the total of all amounts bet by at least six (6) Active Wagering Members under your affiliate account in a calendar month, minus all amounts won by or paid to your Active Wagering Members. "Charge-backs" are amounts deducted when a customer that is a credit card holder discovers irregular unauthorized charge-backs made on the customer's Credit/Debit Card, and the credit card holder requests the bank to reverse these charges. Charge-backs may relate to, but are not limited to, fraudulent use by a third party of the credit card holder's card or card number. Should the player process a charge back, the disputed or charged-back revenue will be forfeited and therefore deducted from the total balance due to you for the current month. Should this deduction of the accumulated revenue exceed your current amount due, your balance will then revert to a negative balance, and you will have to earn revenue to cover the charge-back before you can start earning revenue again. A charge back will stay due until the revenue generated by your other players has covered the amount due. You acknowledge that 11ic can only pay out a percentage of their actual profits, not fraudulent revenue. "Bonuses" include complimentary money, free money offers, credits, sign-up bonuses, promotional amounts and other incentives credited to the account of customers. As customers have not actually purchased these amounts, 11ic cannot pay commissions on the same. Should you fail to be entitled to the Commissionable Earnings in accordance with Clauses 4.1, 4.2, and 4.3 above for failure to maintain at least six (6) Active Wagering Members in a given month, you will not generate any commission in the month and the related member's lost will not be brought forward to the following months. Commissionable earnings will be subject to commissions as calculated using the 11ic Affiliate Program commission structure in force from time to time. Negative earnings are carried forward to the next month. Should the affiliate close the month with a positive balance, payment will be issued if it meets the minimum requirements and commissions will be paid on the positive balance. The Commissionable Earnings of the affiliate calculated based on commission structure will be earned on all transactions that the customer undertakes with the merchant, as long as the affiliate remains a member of this affiliate program. Affiliates will not earn any commission from a member's turnover or win/loss resulting from or connected with any horse racing and casino wagers using the 11ic website.
